summary: Astronomer Carl Sagan leads us on an engaging guided tour of the various elements and cosmological theories of the universe.
cast: Carl Sagan|Jaromír Hanzlík|Jonathan Fahn|Alan Belod|Jean Charney|Bill Grant|Bob Hevelone|Ronald A. Hilbert|Victor C. John|Arthur 'Lonne' Lane|Linda Morabito|Larry Soderblom|Cecilia White|Dana Hlavácová|Josef Vinklár
director: Creators: Ann Druyan, Carl Sagan, Steven Soter
title: Cosmos
